Description:
We will not be proceeding with this feature at this time and will provide a new Roadmap ID when available. Declarative agent adoption metrics and insights in Microsoft 365 Copilot agents report in Viva Insights. #copilotcontrolsystem
GA date: December CY2025
Preview date: October CY2025
Title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot Analytics - Microsoft 365 Copilot agents report
